All of the lyrics to Ritual are bound by a common thread of black magick and the occult, the worship of darkness, and the preservation of inner strength and will.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

    When we play a show, itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s like a ritualÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ a group catharsis. We are unified with our fans through the platform of live performance. There is a real magic there. Our blood is in the ink of this album, our souls in every note.

I know that times are tough, hell, itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s legitimately getting harder and harder to physically get these albums into your hands. I fully realize that.
